mapper.insert: insert into vam_book(bookId,bookName, authorId, publeYear, publisher, cateCode, bookPrice, bookStock, bookDiscount, bookIntro, bookContents) values(book_seq.nextval, #{bookName},#{authorId},#{publeYear},#{publisher},#{cateCode},#{bookPrice}, #{bookStock}, #{bookDiscount},#{bookIntro},#{bookContents})
